  • Field Details

    • activeClients

      public static List<ClientHandler> activeClients
      List of ClientHandler instantiations to show clients actively connected to the server

    • activeSessions

      public static HashMap<String,​Session> activeSessions
      HashMap of strings and Sessions - the string is the ID of the session. Used mostly for active session lookup as well as to represent all active sessions on the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • Musinc

      public Musinc()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args)
      Musinc main method. Run when the jar is started
      Parameters:
      args - args provided by the JVM

    • generateSessionID

      public static String generateSessionID()
      Generates a six-letter/number ID to be used as a Session identifier. Runs a check to see if the ID already exists - extremely low chance of this occurring but done just in case!
      Returns:
      the ID that was generated

    • getActiveSession

      public static Session getActiveSession​(String sessionID)
      Searches through the active sessions and returns the one requested via the ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionID - the ID of the Session that is being requested
      Returns:
      the Session, null if it doesn't exist

    • initialiseServer

      public static void initialiseServer​(int port)
      Initialises the web server. Mostly disused as the main client connections will not function without a SocketServer being instantiated.
      Parameters:
      port - the port that the web server is to be started on

    • initialiseServerSocket

      public static void initialiseServerSocket​(int port)
      Initialises the SocketServer using MainServer's instantiation method.
      Parameters:
      port - the port that the SocketServer is to be started on

    • endProcess

      public static void endProcess​(int exitInt)
      Ends the main process of the server with an exit integer to show error. Closes SocketServer and web server, if either are active.
      Parameters:
      exitInt - error integer to be used as exit reason

    • getLocCredentials

      public static void getLocCredentials()
      Gets the credentials of the server's physical location - the IP address and the country in which it is being hosted. Saves to variables to be used elsewhere and to prevent being called multiple times.

    • parseQuery

      public static void parseQuery​(String query, HashMap<String,​Object> parameters)
      Parses a query for the web server. Mostly disused as the web server itself is not used for much in the program as the client programs cannot function without SocketServer running.
      Parameters:
      query - the query to be parsed
      parameters - any parameters that come with the query
